alert.note: Alert for Western Franklin (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 7:50AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Franklin County through 830 AM EDT... At 750 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stamford, or near North Adams, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Colrain, Charlemont, Leyden, Heath and Rowe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.
